Lastly, we also present the absolute change in each heatwave characteristic, computed for each region in Table S.2 by taking the relative median of the CMIP5 ensemble at each sustained 0.5 °C threshold (Fig. 2). While the ensemble spread of absolute changes cannot be detailed due to article length restrictions, Fig. 4 presents the ensemble spread in absolute changes of heatwave days for CMIP5 and CESM over six regions. These regions were selected since they cover key climates, and are good representatives of results over other regions.
